Module eu.steffo.cleaver
Package eu.steffo.cleaver.logic.stream.input

Class CleaverForkFileInputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.InputStream
eu.steffo.cleaver.logic.stream.input.CleaverForkFileInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICleaverStream, ICleaverInputStream, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class CleaverForkFileInputStream
extends InputStream
implements ICleaverInputStream
A ICleaverInputStream that reads split data from a specific number of files having the same size. Bytes are read one at a time from the files in a round-robin format until their streams are exausted.

  • Constructor Details

    • CleaverForkFileInputStream

      public CleaverForkFileInputStream​(File baseFile, int parts) throws FileNotFoundException
      Construct a new CleaverForkFileInputStream.
      Parameters:
      baseFile - Please see getBaseFile().
      parts - The number of parts the original file is split into.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If a required *.cXX file isn't found.

  • Method Details

    • getBaseFile

      public File getBaseFile()
      Get the base File. The base file is the File that was split by a CleaverForkFileOutputStream and will be now reconstructed by this object. The files read by this stream have the same name of the base file with the addition of a .cXX extension.
      Returns:
      The base file.

    • getPartSize

      public long getPartSize()
      Returns:
      The number of bytes that have been read from a single part.

    • getParts

      public int getParts()
      Returns:
      The number of file parts to read from.

    • getReadFrom

      public int getReadFrom()
      Returns:
      The index of the next FileInputStream to read from.

    • getTotalReadBytes

      public long getTotalReadBytes()
      Returns:
      The number of bytes that have been read, in total.
